Package client

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    a class representing the client for the server-client-intermediate host system. has Capability to send and receive messages to and from the intermediate host, and format read/write requests

      • createPacketData

        public static byte[] createPacketData​(java.lang.String filename,
                                      java.lang.String mode,
                                      byte OP_Code)
        formats a message passed to contain the predefined format for a read request
        Parameters:
        filename - filename to send with the read request
        mode - the mode to send with the read request
        OP_Code - type a OP_Code for the type of request to send
        Returns:
        the message converted into a byte array with proper format
